name: Datascienceprofile
body:
# Profile - Data Scientist 

My passion in Data Science has driven me to enroll into ‘Data Science Specialization’ offered by Johns Hopkins University via Coursera. [This specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specialization/jhudatascience/1) requires that the student completes 9 different courses focused on Data Wrangling, Exploration & Inferring from Data and Predictive Modeling followed by a Capstone Project. *All the courses are based on R programming language as the learning platform*. 

Since Dec 2014, I have focused on constant learning targeting 1-2 courses a month. Having learned the basics of R-programming, each module has exposed me to various functions, packages and techniques useful in the field of Data Science. I am hereby capturing the key techniques, packages and datasets that I have been working on along with some scripts developed by me.

##Techniques

- Data Imputation, 
- **Data Products**: Shiny, GoogleVis, rCharts, Slidify 

##Course Projects

[Cleaning and Creating a Tidy Dataset from the Wearlables Data](https://github.com/Aadityauppal/GettingCleaningData) Raw Data [available here](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip)

[Exploring Electric Power Consumption Data through plots](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97957)

[Exploratory Analysis - Answer questions using PM2.5 Emissions Data](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97955)

[Analysing Health and Economic Damage - Storm Data](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97948)

[Exploring Activity patterns in Daily Activity Monitoring Data](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97939)

[Demonstrating the Central Limit Theorem using Exponential Distribution](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97923)

[Inferential Analysis of ToothGrowth Dataset](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97917)

[Build a Linear regression Model for predicting 'mpg' using the 'mtcars' dataset](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97929)

[Predicting Activity Quality using Activity Monitors Data](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/97938) Raw data available: [Training Data](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/predmachlearn/pml-training.csv), [Test Data](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/predmachlearn/pml-testing.csv), [Data Source](http://groupware.les.inf.puc-rio.br/har)

[Web based application using **Shiny**](https://aadityauppal.shinyapps.io/ProjectApp)

[HTML presentation with **RStudio Presenter**](http://rpubs.com/aadityauppal/95586)

##Datasets

- 'iris', 'ozone', 'vowel', 'AlzheimerDisease', 'concrete', 'segmentationOriginal', 'olive', 'SAheart', 'spam', 'Wage', 'faithful', 'prostate', 'HairEyeColor', 'economics', 'USPersonalExpenditure', 

##Packages

- 'lubridate', 'dplyr', 'ggplot2', 'manipulate', 'reshape2',  
- 'ElemStatLearn', 'AppliedPredictiveModeling', 'pgmm', 'kernlab', 'ISLR', 'quantmod', 
- 'caret', 'rpart', 'randomForest', 'gbm', 'lasso2', 'elasticnet', 'forecast', 'splines', 'rattle'
- 'googleVis', 'rCharts', 'shiny', 'slidify'

##Certificates

[**The Data Scientist's Toolbox**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/EpbtsUjRzE9Aua4x)

[**R Programming**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/B2jRUpvZCqrDyFx3)

[**Getting and Cleaning Data**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/N3Jk7GP4G2uzLWVW)

[**Exploratory Data Analysis**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/Fkb66GQ3DPrEgjdj)

[**Reproducible Research**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/cf94ASgSrAWyCVTT)

[**Statistical Inference**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/pHQf572YP2h7aXtq)

[**Regression Models**](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/records/fpGtRg4Kvjk8pXc5)

[**Practical Machine Learning**]() - Grade awaited

[**Developing Data Products**]() - Grade awaited
